 <a href="

http://anidb.net/perl-bin/animedb.pl?show=anime&aid=3296</a>

Here it is Hellsing Ultimate in 1080p Dual Audio! For the first time I have edited the Subtitles and made custom subs(let me know how I did, and yes Alucard is "Arucard" in Japanese....So says Funimation, lol). Please seed and enjoy :) IX and X coming in October :P ***Also be warned this anime series is a little graphic so try not to watch it around children or the elderly....ok?

]1. I used MakeMKV to turn the BD .ISO sources into .mkv,while editing out the extras/menus.
2. I used Handbrake to reencode the video to save space.(File size was ~140GB)Had RF set to 19 and ran slow on High Profile. New file size ~27.6GB.
3.I used Subtitle Edit to turn the BD subs into .SSA format(to save space.)
4.I used Aegisub to add style to the original subtitles.
5.I used MKVmerge to mux all the sources together and split the file into episodes.
